description: Test cases for CardChecking extension - stored eBay item specifics for regression testing

cases.name: Disney Lorcana - Genie Enchanted
cases.notes: Card name takes priority over character. Hyphen in name requires special handling.

cases.name: One Piece TCG - Rebecca

itemSpecifics.set: ONE PIECE AWAKENING OF THE NEW ERA

expectedExtraction.name: REBECCA
expectedExtraction.set: ONE PIECE AWAKENING OF THE NEW ERA

cases.notes: Manufacturer listed as Nintendo instead of Bandai. Game field detection works.

cases.name: Garbage Pail Kids - Itchy Richie
cases.notes: Edge case: Topps is sports brand but 'garbage pail' keyword routes to PriceCharting. Card number has letter suffix.

cases.name: Star Wars Galaxy Series 7 - Jedi A La Kurosawa
cases.notes: Edge case: Topps manufacturer but 'star wars' keyword routes to PriceCharting. Uses player/athlete field for card name.

cases.name: Star Wars 1977 - R2-D2 Artoo Detoo Quoted Name
cases.title: 1977 Topps Star Wars #76 "Artoo Detoo on the Rebel Starship" (PSA 8) R2-D2

expectedExtraction.name: Artoo Detoo on the Rebel Starship

cases.notes: Tests quoted card name extraction from title overriding character field. Character is R2-D2 but actual card name is in quotes.

cases.name: Digimon - Venusmon
cases.notes: Game field 'Digimon' routes to PriceCharting. Card name and character both have same value.

cases.name: Yu-Gi-Oh - Blue-Eyes White Dragon LOB-001

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Lightly played (Excellent): Not in original packaging or professionally graded
itemSpecifics.set: The Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon

expectedExtraction.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
expectedExtraction.set: The Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon

cases.notes: Ungraded card. LOB-001 hyphenated card number format. Classic Yu-Gi-Oh card.

cases.name: Pokemon - Lapras Fossil Holo
cases.notes: Pokemon TCG with slash card number format (10/62). Wizards of the Coast manufacturer routes to PriceCharting.

cases.name: Star Wars 1977 - Luke Skywalker #1
cases.title: 1977 STAR WARS #1 LUKE SKYWALKER PSA 5
cases.notes: Sparse item specifics - relies on title parsing. Tests fallback to title when structured data is minimal.

cases.name: Star Wars Galaxy 7 - Jedi A La Kurosawa (Title Parse)
cases.title: 2012 Topps Star Wars Galaxy 7 "JEDI A LA KUROSAWA" #777 PSA 10 GEM MINT **277
cases.notes: Has set/year/manufacturer but missing card name and number. Tests title parsing for quoted card names and #number extraction.

cases.name: Pokemon - Lapras Fossil 1st Edition
cases.title: Lapras 10/62 Fossil Holo 1999 Pokemon Card, Excellent Condition, Ungraded

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Lightly played (Excellent): Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: 1st Edition Pokemon card. Tests features field inclusion in search and proper brandKeywords parsing for 'fossil', '1st', 'edition'.

cases.name: Magic: The Gathering - Black Lotus Unlimited

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near mint or better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Iconic MTG card. Tests that 'black' isn't filtered as a color keyword. Set is 'Unlimited' which is also a feature.

cases.name: Magic: The Gathering - Black Lotus PSA 4
cases.notes: Graded MTG card. Set name includes year ('1993 Magic The Gathering Unlimited'). Has 'grader' field in addition to 'professional grader'.

cases.name: Basketball - Cooper Flagg Bowman Chrome

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Excellent: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: First sports card test case. Routes to SportsCardsPro. Has sport and team fields for routing detection.

cases.name: Marvel - Throg Purple Shimmer

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near mint or better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Marvel non-sport card. Topps manufacturer but 'marvel' keyword routes to PriceCharting. Uses character field for name.

cases.name: Football - Chris Cooley Rookie Ticket Auto

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Excellent: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Football autograph card with insert set. Tests sport field routing and insert set extraction.

cases.name: Baseball - Carlos Correa Superfractor 1/1 BGS 10
cases.notes: Baseball 1/1 superfractor with BGS grading. Tests BGS grader extraction and rare parallel handling.

cases.name: Baseball - Willie Mays 1966 Topps #1
cases.title: Graded 1966 Topps Willie Mays #1 Baseball Card PSA 5 Excellent

itemSpecifics.brand: HOFSM.COM Hall of Fame Sports Memorabilia

cases.notes: Sparse item specifics - missing set, year, card number. Relies on title parsing. Sport is 'N/A' but team field triggers sports routing.

cases.name: One Piece - Monkey.D.Luffy Promo PSA 8
cases.notes: One Piece promo card. Card number format ST10-006 (alphanumeric with hyphen). Game field 'One Piece CCG' for routing.

cases.name: Soccer - Francesco Camarda UEFA Chrome Auto
cases.title: 2025 FRANCESCO CAMARDA 081/199 AUTO TOPPS CHROME UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE AQUA

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Excellent: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Soccer card with UEFA Champions League. Tests soccer routing to SportsCardsPro and international player name handling.

cases.name: Soccer - Cristiano Ronaldo CGC 10 Leaf Legends
cases.notes: CGC graded soccer card. Tests CGC grader extraction and player/athlete priority over card name (which contains set name 'Leaf Legends').

cases.name: Baseball - Billy Ripken 1989 Fleer FF Error
cases.notes: Famous 'FF' error card. Error not indicated in item specifics. Note: eBay lists as 'Billy' but SportsCardsPro has 'Bill'.

cases.name: Hockey - Mathew Barzal Ultimate Rookie Auto

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near Mint or Better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Hockey rookie auto. Tests Hockey-NHL sport detection and garbage 'card name' field being ignored in favor of player/athlete.

cases.name: Pokemon - Wishiwashi Japanese Dream League

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near mint or better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Japanese Pokemon card. Tests foreign language card handling. Language field not currently captured but card should still be found.

cases.name: Baseball - Hank Aaron 1973 Topps SGC 6

itemSpecifics.card name: 1973 Topps Hank Aaron SGC 6 Atlanta Braves #100 C08

cases.notes: SGC graded vintage card. Tests SGC extraction from condition field and vintage card handling.

cases.name: Basketball - Shaquille O'Neal Minimal Item Specifics
cases.title: 2025-26 Topps Chrome Tall Tales Green Refractor #TT-11 Shaquille O'Neal /99

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near mint or better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Minimal item specifics - relies almost entirely on title parsing. Tests fallback behavior when seller provides poor data. 'sport: Raw' is garbage data.

cases.name: Wrestling - John Cena 2025 Topps Now WWE PSA 10
cases.notes: Wrestling card. Tests 'Wrestling' sport detection routing to SportsCardsPro.

cases.name: Basketball - Multi-Player 1980-81 Topps Magic Johnson Rookie

itemSpecifics.player/athlete: John Long, Magic Johnson, Ron Boone
itemSpecifics.team: Detroit Pistons, Los Angeles Lakers, Utah Jazz

expectedExtraction.name: John Long, Magic Johnson, Ron Boone
expectedExtraction.team: Detroit Pistons, Los Angeles Lakers, Utah Jazz

cases.notes: Multi-player card with Magic Johnson rookie. Tests handling of 'series' field with card brand name not triggering comic detection.

cases.name: Golf - Tiger Woods 2001 Upper Deck Auto BGS 7.5
cases.notes: Golf card with BGS decimal grade (7.5) from condition field. Tests golf sport detection and autograph card handling.

cases.name: Comic - Amazing Spider-Man #34 CGC 5.5
cases.title: Amazing Spider-Man #34 (1966) 2nd Gwen Stacy CGC 5.5 DZ137
cases.notes: CGC graded Silver Age comic. Tests series title, publication year, issue number, era, and publisher extraction.

cases.name: Comic - Silver Surfer #15 CBCS 8.5
cases.title: Silver Surfer #15 - Marvel Comic CBCS 8.5

itemSpecifics.artist/writer: Stan Lee, Gene Colan, Joe Sinnott, John Buscema, Paul Reinman, Dan Adkins

cases.notes: Bronze Age comic. Title says CBCS but item specifics say CGC (seller error). Tests comic detection via era, publisher, series fields.

cases.name: Comic - Fantastic Four #25 CBCS 3.5
cases.title: Fantastic Four #25 CBCS 3.5 1964 Marvel 2nd Thing vs Hulk Silver Age Key
cases.notes: CBCS graded Silver Age comic. Tests CBCS grader detection and comic routing to PriceCharting.

cases.name: Comic - Spider-Man #1 Stegman Variant CGC 9.6
cases.title: Spider-Man #1 Stegman Variant Cover (2022)
cases.notes: Modern Age variant cover comic. Tests variant cover detection, cover artist extraction, and variant search query building.

cases.name: Comic - The Joker #1 CGC 7.0
cases.title: The Joker #1 CGC Graded 7.0

itemSpecifics.artist/writer: Irv Novick, Denny O'Neil, Dick Giordano
itemSpecifics.character: Two-Face (Harvey Dent) (Villain), Catwoman, Mr. Kemp, Two-Face, Joker, Penguin, Batman (Bruce Wayne) (Poster), James Gordon, Senior Alvarez (Villain), Joker (Villain), Riddler

cases.notes: DC Comics Bronze Age comic. Grade is in title as 'CGC Graded 7.0' not in item specifics. Tests DC publisher detection and title grade parsing.

cases.name: Comic - ShadowLand #1 PGX 9.6 Variant
cases.title: PGX Graded 9.6 NM ShadowLand black and white Variant Edition #1 DAMAGED CASE
cases.notes: PGX graded comic with variant cover. Grade in title as 'PGX Graded 9.6'. Item specifics say 'Marvels' but title says 'ShadowLand' (seller error). Tests PGX grader detection.

cases.name: Comic - Walking Dead #193 CGC 9.8 Image Comics
cases.title: Walking Dead #193 CGC 9.8 1st First Printing Edition Variant Cover Last Issue

itemSpecifics.features: 1st Edition, Key Issue, First Printing, Variant Cover

cases.notes: Image Comics (independent publisher) Walking Dead final issue. Tests Image publisher detection, CGC from item specifics, variant cover, and cover artist extraction.

cases.name: Comic - Star Wars #43 CGC 9.6 Newsstand
cases.title: Star Wars 43 Marvel Comics 1981 CGC 9.6 Near Mint+ White Pages Newsstand Edition
cases.notes: Bronze Age Star Wars Newsstand variant. Tests 'variant type' field extraction for Newsstand editions.

cases.name: Comic - Punisher Spider-Man #34 Ungraded
cases.title: PUNISHER SPIDER-MAN #34 SIGNED BY ARTIST BOB MCLEOD AUTOGRAPHED COVER RARE
cases.notes: Ungraded Modern Age comic. Tests 'year' field (not 'publication year'), 'Marvel' publisher (not 'Marvel Comics'), and ungraded detection.

cases.name: UFC - Conor McGregor 2024 Topps Chrome PSA 10
cases.notes: UFC/MMA card. Tests 'Mixed Martial Arts (MMA)' sport detection routing to SportsCardsPro.

cases.name: NASCAR - Jeff Gordon 1994 Maxx
cases.notes: NASCAR racing card. Tests 'Racing-NASCAR' sport detection routing to SportsCardsPro.

cases.name: Pokemon - Charizard EX Korean SV 151
cases.notes: Korean language Pokemon card. Tests non-English card handling. Routes to PriceCharting.

cases.name: Tennis - Roger Federer 2003 NetPro Rookie
cases.notes: Tennis card. Tests 'Tennis' sport detection routing to SportsCardsPro.

cases.name: Weiss Schwarz - Aang Avatar TLA

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near mint or better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.notes: Weiss Schwarz Japanese TCG (English version). Tests 'Weiss Schwarz' game detection routing to PriceCharting.

cases.name: Baseball - Mike Trout BGS 9.5 with Subgrades
cases.title: 2011 Topps Update Mike Trout RC BGS 9.5 GEM MINT (9.5/9.5/9.5/10) #US175
cases.notes: BGS graded card with subgrades in title (9.5/9.5/9.5/10). Tests decimal grade parsing and BGS detection.

cases.name: Basketball - LeBron James Prizm Gold /5
cases.title: 2023-24 Panini Prizm LeBron James Gold Prizm #5/5 Lakers

itemSpecifics.condition: Ungraded - Near mint or better: Not in original packaging or professionally graded

cases.name: Football - Patrick Mahomes Garbage Seller Data
cases.title: Patrick Mahomes 2017 Panini Prizm #269 RC PSA 10 Chiefs
cases.notes: Minimal/garbage item specifics with 'N/A' values. Relies almost entirely on title parsing. Tests resilience to bad seller data.
